topBar.location: on the top of the page, fixed on the top
topBar.description: all components inside the top bar are flexed

menuButton.description: menuButton with menu icon, onclick toggles the MenuBar

form.description: it consists of input type search and button with icon which are placed inside the label

Tooltip2.description: it consists of a button with icon when button is clicked it toggle into fullscreen

Dropdown1.description: it consists of a button with icon when when hover on button a dropdown menu is shown with four icons and text

Dropdown2.description: it consists of a button with icon when when hover on button a dropdown menu is shown with heading, button and 3 anchor elements and text

Dropdown3.description: it consists of a button with avatar when when hover on button a dropdown menu is shown with heading, text and 3 anchor elements with icon and text

Menu Items.location: left side of page and all Menu Items align vertically in MenuBar
Menu Items.description: List of menu items containing sub-menu of their own

MenuBar.children_orientation_description: Menu deatils are accordions where all items are in list format

main.location: below the topBar and beside the MenuBar
main.description: all components are align in vertical

Tables.description: each table consists of heading, table header, three table rows, four table columns and each cell consists of text

footer.description: all components inside the top bar are flexed

link1.description: it consist text with nav link

link2.description: it consist text with nav link

functionality.sidebar_toggle: a toggle feature that allows the sidebar to be hidden or shown along with resizing to show only icons
